attributes.action: ABOLISH ADVERTISING FOR LEGALISED LOAN SHARKS
attributes.additional_details: Extortionate charges for less fortunate people are disgusting  and what makes it worse is the media give them advertising space in papers and on tv. If people can only get essential household items by paying weekly, surely this is bad enough, but to be totally ripped off, by most of the time having to pay double sometimes treble because of their situation then the government should put a stop to this once and for all.
